alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:58AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kaufman, Van Zandt, northern Henderson and Rains Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 158 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Emory to near Fruitvale to 7 miles southwest of Canton to 7 miles north of Purtis Creek State Park to near Kemp. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Grand Saline, Mabank, Chandler, Van, Malakoff, Tool, Seven Points, Emory, Kemp, Brownsboro, Eustace, Trinidad, Fruitvale, Edom, Grays Prairie, Enchanted Oaks, and Caney City. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 523 and 542. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
